job.title: Software Application Production/DevOps Engineer
job.description:
If you are an experienced Software/IT professional with proven success owning the application production environment including changes, security and compliance, and incident response, this is the role for you.
We are a tech-enabled pharmaceutical services company. With nearly 10 years in the business, we provide direct, hands-on support to pharmaceutical manufacturers along with custom services to increase patient access and facilitate the economic and operational efficiencies in the prescription fulfillment process.
We are looking for an experienced Software/IT Engineer to join our team.
What You Will Be Doing
You will own the application production environment including all changes, security and compliance, and incident response.
Achieve/Maintain HIPAA compliance of the production environment
Respond to production-related client requests (ad hoc changes and queries)
Reporting data results back to the relevant business stakeholders/customers
Ensure all changes to the production environment are documented
Execute and/or oversee changes to the production environment
Perform regular security tests
Own/manage the CI/CD pipeline
Monitor performance and uptime of the production application
Respond to and document production incidents (security incidents, application failures)
Work with outside compliance experts to create processes and software safeguards that allow the production environment, data access procedures, and software development processes to achieve HIPAA compliance.
Work with our business rules engine and analyze business rule results
Monitor operational trends in our transactional data
Code deployments
Diagnose bugs and develop fixes
What You Need for this Position
Qualifications
BS Degree
Overall experience in software/database development, security and similar
Experience owning the application production environment as it relates to changes, security and compliance, and incident response
Production Application performance and uptime monitoring, production incident response, security incidents, application failures, etc.
Disaster Recovery Process creation
Scripting and knowledge of database structures
SQL/NoSQL
Python, PowerShell, JSON
Microsoft Office - Excel and PowerPoint
BONUS
HIPAA compliance or similar environment
What's In It for You
Competitive Salary and Benefits
So, if you are an experienced Developer/IT Engineer with relevant experience, please apply today!
Email Your Resume In Word To
